item.title: Netflix’s Best New Comedy Show Doubles Its Critic Scores, Hits #2 In Top 10
item.description: The best new show to hit Netflix in a while has arrived with great scores from critics, but it may not be for everyone, given its subject matter.

item.title: Supplier Astemo Seeks To Deal With Automotive Industry’s Future
item.description: Japan's Astemo auto supplier and its U.S. unit, Astemo Americas, are working to deal with continuing industry changes, including tariffs.

item.title: The ‘Legend Of Zelda’ Movie Has Already Been Delayed, Two Years Before Release
item.description: Despite it not being out for two years, the Legend of Zelda film has already announced a delay. Albeit not a very long one.

item.title: FBI Warns iPhone And Android Messaging App Users Not To Click
item.description: The FBI has spoken — do not click on these messages.

item.title: AI For The Front Lines: How Voice Tech Is Reshaping The Trades
item.description: When most people think of AI transforming industries, their local plumber's or HVAC technician's office is often overlooked.
